citations.narrative:
According to licensee none of the 17 adult dogs on the kennel inventory have been given Parvo/Distemper vaccinations in
the last 12 months as directed by the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC). Following the PVC and vaccinating for diseases
such as Parvo/Distemper are necessary to prevent these diseases, which can cause significant harm, to include death, in
dogs. The licensee must follow the PVC as directed by the Attending Veterinarian for all dogs. The licensee must keep
medical records for the dogs and make the records available to the inspector upon request.
To be corrected by: May 10, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
According to licensee none of the 17 adult dogs on the kennel inventory have been given Parvo/Distemper vaccinations in 
the last 12 months as directed by the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC). Following the PVC and vaccinating for diseases 
such as Parvo/Distemper are necessary to prevent these diseases, which can cause significant harm, to include death, in 
dogs. The licensee must follow the PVC as directed by the Attending Veterinarian for all dogs. The licensee must keep 
medical records for the dogs and make the records available to the inspector upon request.  
To be corrected by: May 10, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
